Creating the tf_idf values for the bigram:

```{r}
bigrams_united <- bigrams_filtered %>% 
  unite(bigrams, word1, word2,sep = " ")


bigram_tf_idf <- bigrams_united %>%
  count(reviews.title, bigrams) %>%
  bind_tf_idf(bigrams, reviews.title, n) %>%
  arrange(desc(tf_idf))

bigram_tf_idf
```
